#summary Introduction of static meta-programming, DSLs and various Groovy frameworks.

= Lesson 2 details =

== Agenda ==

  * Advanced dynamic meta-programing - builders
  * Static meta-programming
  * Domain Specific Languages
  * DSL-based frameworks - Grails, Griffon, Gradle

== Preparation ==

  * Checkout the recent state of our Project from [http://code.google.com/p/concepts-of-modern-programming-languages/source/checkout SVN]
  * Grab Groovy from [http://groovy.codehaus.org/Download the groovy download page]
  * Grab Grails from [http://grails.org/Download the grails download page]
  * Install Java (if you don't have it installed) from [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html the Java download site]

The source code of the assignment is accessible in [http://concepts-of-modern-programming-languages.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/2011-12/lesson2/homework/Calculator.groovy SVN].
